The most exciting time of year for lovers of perfection, art and history is here. The Winter Show is the most prestigious art, antiques and design fair in the country. It opens on January 18 and will run through January 27, 2019 at the Park Avenue Armory.

About The Winter Show

Founded in 1954, The Winter Show draws art and objects from a variety of disciplines. It’s comprised of a selection of exhibitors who are experts on their fields. The collections are visually appealing as they can range from antiques that are hundreds of years old to contemporary glass sculptures. Plus, at The Winter Show, exhibitors are free to showcase their work in any way they seem fit. As a result, walking through its aisles is like being in a top art museum surrounded by artwork that you can take home — if you can afford it!

Even if your pockets aren’t that deep, you’ll be happy to know that all proceeds go to East Side House Settlement, a charity that provides opportunities for disadvantaged families in South Bronx and Northern Manhattan.

Connoisseurs Night at The Winter Show

If you want to channel your inner Robert Langdon, go to the Connoisseurs Night on January 25. Entrance is included in the daily admission ticket. Think of it as an opportunity to meet like-minded individuals in booth talks, wine tastings and deep conversations about art and antiques.

More Information

Location

Park Avenue Armory: 643 Park Avenue, between 66 & 67th Streets , New York, NY 10065

Hours

Open daily: 12pm–8pm
Sundays & Thursday: 12pm–6pm
Tuesday: 12pm–4:30pm
Opening Night Party: January 17, 2019
Connoisseurs Night: January 25, 2019 from 5:30pm–8pm

Tickets

Daily admission: $25, includes the 270-page catalogue
If can spare a few hundred dollars to support the charity, tickets for Opening Night start at $300.

If you’re packing an exquisite outfit for The Winter Show, you’ll want to stay in an equally elegant hotel. The Royalton Park Avenue has luxury rooms and remarkable suites with a mix of downtown edge and uptown sensibility. Check out our offers for stays in January and February!
